radiographic_examinations.findings: The twin with ketotic hypoglycemia displayed hypoglycemic symptoms (B-glucose 2.0 mmol/liter) after 18 h of fasting; the healthy twin showed no symptoms and was normoglycemic (B-glucose 3.4 mmol/liter).
The maximum increase in the twin with ketotic hypoglycemia was 5.0 mmol/liter; in the healthy twin it was 1.3 mmol/liter.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: The maximum increase in the twin with ketotic hypoglycemia decreased from 16.6 mmol/liter to 5.0 mmol/liter compared to the previous test.
